## Texture.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `Texture` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(options: {
        context: Context;
        width: number;
        height: number;
        source?: TextureSource | HTMLVideoElement | HTMLImageElement;
        pixelFormat?: PixelFormat;
        pixelDatatype?: PixelDatatype;
        preMultiplyAlpha?: boolean;
        flipY?: boolean;
        skipColorSpaceConversion?: boolean;
        sampler?: Sampler;
    });
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | { context: [Context](./toygl.context.md)<!-- -->; width: number; height: number; source?: TextureSource \| HTMLVideoElement \| HTMLImageElement; pixelFormat?: [PixelFormat](./toygl.pixelformat.md)<!-- -->; pixelDatatype?: [PixelDatatype](./toygl.pixeldatatype.md)<!-- -->; preMultiplyAlpha?: boolean; flipY?: boolean; skipColorSpaceConversion?: boolean; sampler?: Sampler; } |  |

## Example

Create a 1x1 dimension (RGBA, float) texture with initial data:

```js
const texture = new Texture({
  context: context,
  width: 1,
  height: 1,
  source: {
    arrayBufferView: new Float32Array([
       1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0,
    ]),
  },
  pixelFormat: PixelFormat.RGBA,
  pixelDatatype: PixelDatatype.FLOAT,
});
```
